# [Interview #836: Orem Signing Report - Zas, Entry #36](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=836#36)

#### Zas

The second
*Alloy of Law*
is called
*Shadows of Self*
, right?

#### Brandon Sanderson

*Shadows of Self*
, yep.
